code: @Test public void testServiceFilter() throws Exception {     Exchange result.     result = template.request("direct:start", e -> {         return.     }).     assertHeader(result, ServiceCallConstants.SERVICE_HOST, "host1").     assertHeader(result, ServiceCallConstants.SERVICE_PORT, 9093).     result = template.request("direct:start", e -> {         return.     }).     assertHeader(result, ServiceCallConstants.SERVICE_HOST, "host4").     assertHeader(result, ServiceCallConstants.SERVICE_PORT, 9094). }

// ********************* // Helpers // ********************* private void assertHeader(Exchange exchange, String header, Object expectedValue) {     Assert.assertNotNull(exchange).     Assert.assertTrue(exchange.getIn().getHeaders().containsKey(header)).     Assert.assertEquals(expectedValue, exchange.getIn().getHeader(header)). }
